channel.title: [Pi] Barricades [Pi]
channel.description: Hey guys, the barricades in my CastleWars aren't solid. After you set them, you can just run right through them. Also, whenever you attack them, they attack back and if you move they follow you 0.0 How can I make it so that they don't retaliate and are solid objects?

item.title: [Pi] Barricades [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Hmmm ill try it.

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] Barricades [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Angel Carlos, post:14, topic:524099”]It is nearly impossible to add clipping if you follow a tutorial, then it is easy.

But i high;y recommend doing it yourself, as the tutorials out their for clipping is too old.[/quote]
Region Clipping isn’t that old, nor is it hard to add.
Plus, just because something is ‘old’ doesn’t mean it is bad.
Also, your first sentence makes absolutely no sense.

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] Barricades [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @Angel_Carlos Angel Carlos
item.description:
@Angel_Carlos wrote:

It is nearly impossible to add clipping if you follow a tutorial, then it is easy.

But i high;y recommend doing it yourself, as the tutorials out their for clipping is too old.

item.title: [Pi] Barricades [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

b00mz1029:

How do I add clipping to it?

If your server has clipping, it will clip itself. If your server doesn’t. You’re going to have a bad time.

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] Barricades [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

Make it NPC which wont attack back, but also clips your way.

PS: Remember to put on limit so all places wont be full of them.

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] Barricades [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

[quote=“Null Amount, post:9, topic:524099”][quote author=b00mz1029 link=topic=642643.msg4327783#msg4327783 date=1373227816]

That sounds like they added the objects as NPCs. Not objects.

Exactly, I just need help adding the objects. I think I need to edit this code, but idk what to change it to. And I’m not positive that’s what I need to change.

if(itemId == 4053) { c.getItems().deleteItem(4053,c.getItems().getItemSlot(4053),1); Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc2(1532, c.absX, c.absY, 0, 0,200,0,0,100); c.sendMessage("You setup a barricade."); }
[/quote]

Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc2(1532, c.absX, c.absY, 0, 0,200,0,0,100); Change that so it spawns the barricade object if that’s what you want. However, I don’t know if you want it like that since you won’t be able to attack an object(?).[/quote]

Do you know what I can change it to so that it makes it so that you can kill the barricade but also that it blocks your path?

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] Barricades [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“b00mz1029, post:8, topic:524099”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=642643.msg4327779#msg4327779 date=1373227481]
That sounds like they added the objects as NPCs. Not objects.
[/quote]
Exactly, I just need help adding the objects. I think I need to edit this code, but idk what to change it to. And I’m not positive that’s what I need to change.

if(itemId == 4053) { c.getItems().deleteItem(4053,c.getItems().getItemSlot(4053),1); Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc2(1532, c.absX, c.absY, 0, 0,200,0,0,100); c.sendMessage("You setup a barricade."); }[/quote]

Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc2(1532, c.absX, c.absY, 0, 0,200,0,0,100); Change that so it spawns the barricade object if that’s what you want. However, I don’t know if you want it like that since you won’t be able to attack an object(?).

Read full topic

@b00mz1029 wrote:

[quote=“Angel Carlos, post:5, topic:524099”]Objects can attack people and move… Just make it

Barricade, as a random npc, or something???

You are making no sense!!![/quote]
The barricade is an npc. Name one object that attacks and moves… Okay so. Whenever I press “Set Barricade” It does set the barricade but it just adds the npc, and it doesn’t add any objects, I need help making it add an object. Please do not “try” to help if you don’t know what is going on.

Read full topic
